snippet.title: 断罪のマリア　～ラ･カンパネラ～THE EXORSICM OF MARIA LA CAMPANELLA
snippet.description:
Campanella Mariara opening movie of conviction 
eve of a revolution 
Theme: Canna Natsumi 
Lyrics:  IRUMA RIOKA: · Vocal composer

Campanella Mariara of conviction

Genre : Adventure of love and blessings Exorcist
Content : Full-length full voice ADV /
Compatible models : PlayStation Portable
Release Date : April 26, 2012 (Thursday)

"Maria - La Campanella - of conviction" software for PSP 
is the opening movie. 
Gothic adventure game in earnest. Demonic possession is a girl baptismal name of Maria. Been dispatched from the Vatican to "School of St. Barubina" Exorcist Japanese training institutions Maria visited in Japan. Exorcist of the school Barubina from us with the protection of the angels as Maria Demonic possession is treated as the existence of heresy, gradually familiar love, fight with the devil together. 

Character Voices:

Maria: (CV Kana Kiyoshi Abe) 
Uriel devil: (CV Daisuke Hirakawa) 
dragon Munakata: (CV Hiroki Takahashi) 
Mizukagami beautiful: (CV Noriaki Sugiyama) 
Hiyori Institute Kujo: (CV Hiroki Shimowada) 
Kirito Onbashira (CV: ) 
Hiroshi Shimono Klaus Erhard (CV:) 
Tetsuya Kakihara Darkness (CV:) 
Hiroshi Takashi Yasumoto drop (CV:) 
Yes Sato world Gide (CV:) 
Yuki Fujiwara Joker (CV: KENN) 
Vega (CV:) 
Koichi Yokota Illumina (Shin Ishii CV) 
Father: (CV Takanori Hoshino) 
pope Zacharias: (CV Wakamoto Norio)
 Anna of grief: (CV Mariko Honda) 
Catalina of fresh blood (CV: Satomi slope Ming)
